post:
PrimaHost offered new SSD KVM plans in France. Our VPS’s support a wide range of Operating Systems such as Ubuntu, Debian, CentOS and Windows Server.
We accept payments via PayPal, credit/debit cards (via Stipe), Webmoney and Bitcoin (via Webmoney USD).

SSD-512
• CPU: 1 vCore
• RAM: 512MB
• Hard Drive: 20GB SSD
• Swap: 512MB
• IP addresses: 1 IPv4, 2 IPv6
• Port Speed: 1Gbit
• Bandwidth: 1TB
• OS: Linux
• Features: Anti-DDoS
• Control Panel: SolusVM
• 2,25 €/mo. | $2.5/mo.
